benchmark_details.name: InfiniBench
benchmark_details.overview: InfiniBench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate large multi-modal models in long video understanding, featuring over 1,000 hours of content and 87.7K question-answer pairs that assess grounding-based and reasoning-based skills necessary for understanding long-form videos such as movies and TV shows.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate the abilities of multi-modal large language models (MLLMs) in comprehending long-form videos.

data.source: Over 1,000 hours of video content sourced from movies and TV shows.
data.annotation: Manually curated and verified questions targeting multiple cognitive skills.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on accuracy for grounding tasks and a scoring system for reasoning tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Models are ranked based on their accuracy in answering questions correctly and the quality of their responses.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o achieved 47.1% accuracy on grounding skills.
methodology.validation: Validated through manual checks to ensure clarity and correctness of Q/A pairs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Privacy measures include careful curation of video content and question-answer pairs to avoid personal data inclusion.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data used from publicly available datasets with compliance for academic research.
